item.title: Understanding Stemmers (Natural Language Processing)
item.description: I am interested in NLP and have already some experience with Apache Solr. It’s time to dig a little in-deep regarding stemmers. First of all, I was looking for a general definition of what a stemmer is, and I found this one, which IMHO is quite good: stemmer — an algorithm for removing inflectional and derivational endings in order to reduce word forms to a common stem So what a stemmer does is nothing more, than converting words to their word stem.
